alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 03 at 1:31PM EDT until June 04 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT SUNDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 6 to 10 feet in the surf zone. For the Coastal Flood Statement, up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.4 to 12.3 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA, Eastern Plymouth MA, Barnstable MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...For the High Surf Advisory, until 8 PM EDT Sunday. For the Coastal Flood Statement, from 10 PM EDT this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Splashover possible along the North Shore from Gloucester to Newburyport. Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Viewing the rough surf from jetties will be very dangerous given large breaking waves onto rocks and other near shore structures. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways. Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.
